headline: Charisma Test for a Man of Wry Detachment
abstract: The millennial former mayor of a midsize city has far surpassed expectations in the 2020 race. He doesn’t get fired up. Can he fire up people in Iowa?
lead_paragraph: OTTUMWA, Iowa — No presidential campaign is spared its awkward moments: overlong hugs from supporters, groaners about the Iowa weather, white lies about the caliber of the local cuisine.
